alert.note: Alert for Cape Girardeau; Perry; Scott (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 8:24PM CDT until May 14 at 1:51PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois... Mississippi River at Cape Girardeau Mississippi River at Thebes ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY, MAY 14... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Cape Girardeau. * WHEN...From late Friday night to Saturday, May 14. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 30.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Saturday morning to a crest of 36.9 feet early Wednesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday, May 14. - Flood stage is 32.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
